[00:00.00]a m a r i (Explicit) - J. Cole
[00:00.68]Lyrics by：J. Cole
[00:01.37]Composed by：J. Cole
[00:02.06]Bada-ba bada-ba
[00:05.58]Bada-ba da-da
[00:09.18]
[00:09.92]Off-Season
[00:10.44]
[00:13.30]Let's work hey
[00:14.76]
[00:15.42]Plottin' my escape this game rot a n***a's faith
[00:17.79]Got a couple M's hidin' in the safe
[00:19.49]Imagination turned a Honda into Wraith
[00:21.40]I was doin' eighty on the interstate
[00:23.03]Tryna make it back before my class started
[00:24.93]Country n***a never seen a passport
[00:26.80]'Til I popped off and got a bag for it
[00:28.57]Now I'm at the Garden sittin' half court
[00:30.47]Watchin' Jr. catch it off the backboard
[00:32.21]'Ville n***a never seen nothing
[00:34.09]'Cept a f**king triple beam jumping
[00:35.83]Good d**e leave a fiend krumping
[00:37.65]Made it out it gotta mean something
[00:39.53]Either you gon' hustle or that n***a Uncle Sam got yo' a*s re-enlisting
[00:43.12]2-6 murder scene pumping
[00:44.97]Better leave it tucked if you ain't dumping
[00:46.71]Pow pow n***a he slumping
[00:48.59]Twelve comin' we ain't seen nothing
[00:50.40]Time change n***as ain't rumbling no more
[00:52.73]Nah what for
[00:53.70]Hungry for more
[00:54.60]If you solo these vocals listen close and you can hear grumbling
[00:57.61]Multi' and I'm still munching
[00:59.44]Big bag never fear fumbling
[01:01.28]Want smoke
[01:01.85]N***a don't choke
[01:02.76]I'm a whole f**kin' nicotine company
[01:04.92]Dreamville the Army not a Navy
[01:06.81]How could you ever try to play me
[01:08.62]Kill 'em on a song walk up out the booth do the Westbrook rock-a-baby
[01:12.01]
[01:12.59]I never fall out with the bro
[01:14.27]Hate when your family turn into foe
[01:16.22]We had a penthouse on the road
[01:17.77]Interior decorated with the h*es
[01:19.82]Just like a multiple-choice getting chose
[01:21.60]My n***as like "Eenie meenie miney moe"
[01:23.46]Scoop up a dime-piece like we homeless
[01:25.26]Then we gon' send 'em back pigeon-toed
[01:27.07]Out of the concrete was a rose and winters was cold
[01:30.08]
[01:30.69]Had to go over and stand by the stove
[01:32.42]We from the Southeast n***as know
[01:34.31]This where the opps creep real slow
[01:36.15]Won't vote but they mob deep with the poles
[01:38.00]I punch the time sheet not no more
[01:39.76]And now my assigned seat is the throne
[01:42.00]
[01:42.64]Plottin' my escape this game rot a n***a's faith
[01:44.96]Got a couple M's hidin' in the safe
[01:46.78]Imagination turned a Honda into Wraith
[01:48.63]I was doin' eighty on the interstate
[01:50.48]Tryna make it back before my class started
[01:52.15]Country n***a never seen a passport
[01:54.02]'Til I popped off and got a bag for it
[01:55.85]Now I'm at the Garden sittin' half court
[01:57.66]Watchin' Jr. catch it off the backboard
[01:59.54]'Ville n***a never seen nothing
[02:01.29]'Cept a f**king triple beam jumping
[02:03.27]Good d**e leave a fiend krumping
[02:04.91]Made it out it gotta mean something
[02:06.72]Made it out it gotta mean something
[02:08.64]Made it out it gotta mean something
[02:10.24]
[02:12.94]Bada-ba bada-ba bada-ba ah-ah
data.trans:
[ti:a m a r i (Explicit)]
[ar:J. Cole]
[al:The Off-Season (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.68]//
[00:01.37]//
[00:02.06]//
[00:05.58]//
[00:09.18]
[00:09.92]//
[00:10.44]
[00:13.30]让我们开始工作
[00:14.76]
[00:15.42]谋划好我的逃跑计划 这个圈子会摧毁人的信念
[00:17.79]保险箱里藏了好几百万
[00:19.49]我的想象力把本田车变成劳斯莱斯幻影
[00:21.40]我在州际公路上以八十迈的速度狂飙
[00:23.03]我想在上课之前赶回来
[00:24.93]乡下小子从来没见过护照
[00:26.80]直到我崭露头角 专门给护照配个包包
[00:28.57]现在我在麦迪逊广场花园 坐在中场边
[00:30.47]看着Dennis Smith Jr. 投出一个篮板球
[00:32.21]Fayetville的兄弟没有见过世面
[00:34.09]除了那些卖货的场面
[00:35.83]上等好货让人变得手舞足蹈
[00:37.65]我离开这种地方 一定是有些能力
[00:39.53]你得埋头苦干 好好工作 否则山姆大叔会把你重新征召入伍
[00:43.12]我家乡的监狱 凶杀现场枪声四起
[00:44.97]如果你不想动手 最好把武器藏好
[00:46.71]砰 砰 哥们 他奄奄一息
[00:48.59]警察赶来 我们什么都没有看见
[00:50.40]时过境迁 大家不再尔虞我诈
[00:52.73]为什么
[00:53.70]渴望得到更多
[00:54.60]如果你单独仔细聆听这些人声 你能够听见肚子咕咕叫的声音
[00:57.61]丰富的选择 我依然大嚼特嚼
[00:59.44]腰缠万贯 从不害怕笨手笨脚
[01:01.28]想要挑事
[01:01.85]不要被呛到
[01:02.76]我可以把整座香烟公司送给你
[01:04.92]Dreamville是陆军 不是海军
[01:06.81]你怎么有胆量在我面前班门弄斧
[01:08.62]写一首歌干掉他们 走出录音室 做着Westbrook的标志性动作
[01:12.01]
[01:12.59]我从未和兄弟闹得不可开交
[01:14.27]讨厌看见你的家人反目成仇
[01:16.22]我们在这条路上有一间顶层公寓
[01:17.77]里面美女云集
[01:19.82]就像从多选题中做出选择一般
[01:21.60]我的兄弟说着 点兵点将 点到谁就是谁
[01:23.46]随意挑选一位美人 我们就像无家可归的人捡起十分钱硬币一样
[01:25.26]等送她们离开的时候 她们都变成内八字
[01:27.07]玫瑰在混凝土之上绽放 冬天寒冷无比
[01:30.08]
[01:30.69]必须走过去 站在火炉旁边
[01:32.42]我们来自东南边 人人皆知
[01:34.31]在这里 敌人跟在身后缓慢潜行
[01:36.15]不会去参加投票 他们是拿着武器招摇过市
[01:38.00]按时打卡上班的日子一去不复返
[01:39.76]如今王座已是我的囊中之物
[01:42.00]
[01:42.64]谋划好我的逃跑计划 这个圈子会摧毁人的信念
[01:44.96]保险箱里藏了好几百万
[01:46.78]我的想象力把本田车变成劳斯莱斯幻影
[01:48.63]我在州际公路上以八十迈的速度狂飙
[01:50.48]我想在上课之前赶回来
[01:52.15]乡下小子从来没见过护照
[01:54.02]直到我崭露头角 专门给护照配个包包
[01:55.85]现在我在麦迪逊广场花园 坐在中场边
[01:57.66]看着Dennis Smith Jr. 投出一个篮板球
[01:59.54]Fayetville的兄弟没有见过世面
[02:01.29]除了那些卖货的场面
[02:03.27]上等好货让人变得手舞足蹈
[02:04.91]我离开这种地方 一定是有些能力
[02:06.72]我离开这种地方 一定是有些能力
[02:08.64]我离开这种地方 一定是有些能力
[02:10.24]
[02:12.94]//
